name: Shaffer
body:
### Overview

Code for the ACM MM2016 paper "A Novel Shadow-Free Feature Extractor for Real-Time Road Detection" ( ieeexplore paper html pdf )

This project is part of [OpenVehicleVision](https://github.com/baidut/OpenVehicleVision/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
